title: Macworld Podcast: Black Friday shopping tips for Apple products
content:
‘Tis the season to go shopping! In this episode of the Macworld Podcast, we’re going to be your best shopping buddy! We talk about how to get the best deals on Apple products, how to avoid getting ripped off, and what you need to look out for so you can have the best gift-giving season.

This is episode 769 with Jason Cross, Michael Simon, and Roman Loyola.
